pages.text: You can find Uranium Ore in all biomes at within the +10 to +15 altitude. $(br2) Mineable with $(l)$(4)Diamond mining level$() Tools: $(li)Diamond Pickaxe $(li)Netherite Pickaxe $(li)Platinum Pickaxe $(li)Osmium Pickaxe $(li)All Paxels.

You can find Deepslate Uranium Ore in all biomes at within the -64 to +8 altitude. $(br2) Mineable with $(l)$(4)Diamond mining level$() Tools: $(li)Diamond Pickaxe $(li)Netherite Pickaxe $(li)Platinum Pickaxe $(li)Osmium Pickaxe $(li)All Paxels.
